DocAttribute.Name: Identification
DocAttribute.Documentation: An identifying designation given to a process type.

DocAttribute.Name: LongDescription
DocAttribute.Documentation: An long description, or text, describing the activity in detail. > NOTE  The inherited _SELF\IfcRoot.Description_ attribute is used as the short description.

DocAttribute.Name: ProcessType
DocAttribute.Documentation: The type denotes a particular type that indicates the process further. The use has to be established at the level of instantiable subtypes. In particular it holds the user defined type, if the enumeration of the attribute 'PredefinedType' is set to USERDEFINED.

DocAttribute.Name: OperatesOn
DocAttribute.Documentation: Set of relationships to other objects, e.g. products, processes, controls, resources or actors that are operated on by the process type. > HISTORY New inverse relationship in IFC4.
